about_the_game:
《2 Hours Later 》 is a third person shooter game where players will use various firearms such as handguns, shotguns, assault rifles, and sniper rifles to deal with the zombie virus outbreak crisis.

You will be responsible for the security work of a survivor safety zone, dealing with sudden mutations of latent carriers of zombie virus. If you don't deal with zombies in a timely manner, the zombie virus will quickly infect everyone.

The survivor safety zone is located on the streets of the city, with many survivors scattered throughout. Over time, the number of survivors in the safety zone has increased, and some survivors are virus carriers in the latent period. Once they mutate into zombies, the entire safety zone will face destruction.

content_descriptors.notes: Bloody scenes of shooting zombies with firearms will frequently appear in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 Windows 10 x64 Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660Ti or higher
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
